item.title: CVE-2024-32556|2024-07-25T13:19:35.334Z -- nabil%20lemsieh -- hurrytimer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Nabil Lemsieh HurryTimer allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HurryTimer: from n/a through 2.9.2.
